column3: Multiple-item product retailed as a whole

column2: Multiple-item collection, retailed as separate parts
column3: Used when an ONIX record is required for a collection-as-a-whole, even though it is not currently retailed as such
Product not for retail, and not carrying retail items, eg empty dumpbin, empty counterpack, promotional material
Carrying multiple copies for retailing as separate items, eg shrink-wrapped trade pack, filled dumpbin, filled counterpack
